short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chatbot extension for YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
YouTube Video Assistant is a helpful chatbot for YouTube videos. It lets you ask questions and get answers based on the video's subtitles or captions.

Key Features:
Ask Questions About Videos: Simply ask questions about the video you're watching, and the chatbot will answer using information from the video's subtitles.
Supports Multiple Languages: You can ask questions in English, even if the video is in another language like Hindi, French, or any other language.
Make your YouTube experience better with YouTube Video Assistant! Easily get answers and interact with your videos in any language.
